text: Antoni Vadell Ferrer (17 May 1972 - 12 February 2022) was a Spanish Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Llucmajor in the Balearic Islands. He became a priest in 1998. In 2017, he became the Auxilliary Bishop of Barcelona.
